ISSUE.TITLE: Admin lables are rendering from right side in mobile
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 Beta Steps to reproduce the problem: See admin area in mobile screen ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13154058/108708945-17a15700-7538-11eb-9096-0f2f138aa604.png) Before it was rendering from the left side and looking fine ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13154058/108709081-428bab00-7538-11eb-829d-cf1b2bfd046b.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixed indents in the styles files

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5372 Fixed admin lables rendering in mobile
